description:
Devoted to personal injury and criminal defense cases, Bourne Law Office serves clients in Owenton and throughout Kentucky. We combine more than 35 years of experience in matters that include the following:

• Drunk driving and drug violations
• Traffic tickets
• White collar crimes
• Car accidents and dog bites
• Medical malpractice

We also take cases that involve probate, estate administration and family law.

Any of these issues that our law office handles understandably present serious concerns...
